message: My dearest Mark, it is with the greatest joy that we invite you to witness our union. Your presence means the world to us, and we look forward to celebrating this new chapter with you. Please prepare for a night of dancing, laughter, and endless memories under the castle lights. We can't wait to see you!

Lorens, our cherished friend, you have been an indispensable part of our lives. We would be honored if you would join us as we say 'I do.' Prepare for an evening filled with fine dining and heartfelt toasts. Your friendship is a blessing. See you soon!

My dearest Lady Lyne, your joyful spirit is infectious! We're thrilled to invite you to our special day. Get ready to celebrate love, friendship, and new beginnings. Remember to bring your dancing shoes!

Sweet Sarah, thank you for being a constant source of wisdom and laughter. Please join us for a ceremony and reception that will mark the start of our forever. We are so excited to share this momentous occasion with you!
